hero.subtitle: Holiday or Permanent – we've got your lighting covered

about.subtitle: We handle everything from custom design to professional installation, maintenance, and storage

items.title: Custom Lighting Design
items.description: Tailored lighting design created specifically for your home or business, highlighting architectural features and creating the perfect holiday atmosphere.

items.title: Premium Lights & Décor
items.description: All Christmas lights and décor provided and professionally installed using commercial-grade materials that are 3x brighter than store-bought options.

items.title: Ongoing Maintenance
items.description: Continuous maintenance throughout the holiday season to ensure your display stays perfect. If anything needs attention, we handle it promptly.

items.title: Full Takedown & Storage
items.description: Complete removal after the season ends. All lights and décor are stored at our facility — no storage required on your end.

lightingTypes.title: What Kind of Lights Do We Install?

items.description: Commercial-grade C9 LED bulbs that are 3x brighter than anything you'll find at big-box stores. Every display is custom-fit to your home.
Invisilights permanent lighting systems installed on your home. These are purchased and professionally installed for year-round use.

faq.question: Am I buying the seasonal lights?
faq.answer: No. All seasonal lights and décor are leased and maintained by our team, so you never have to worry about repairs, storage, or climbing ladders. If anything needs attention during the season, we handle it.

faq.question: Do I buy the permanent lighting?
faq.answer: Yes. Permanent lighting systems are purchased and professionally installed on your home. These are yours to keep and enjoy year-round.

faq.question: Do you install lights I already own?
faq.answer: We don't — and here's why: we use professional-grade Christmas lighting on every project so we can guarantee quality, safety, and reliability all season long.

faq.question: Are discounts available?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for installations completed before November, as well as loyalty discounts for continuous years of service.

cta.title: Ready for a Stress-Free Holiday Season?
cta.description: Let us handle everything — from design to installation to storage.

items.title: Residential Christmas Lighting
items.description: Coming home to a beautifully lit house makes the holidays even more special. We design and install custom residential displays tailored to your home and your style. From design to professional installation, we handle everything – so you can skip the ladders and tangled lights.

items.title: Commercial Christmas Lighting
items.description: Make your business stand out this season with professional holiday lighting. We design and install custom commercial displays tailored to your property and brand, helping you welcome customers and spread seasonal cheer.

items.title: Permanent Holiday Lighting
items.description: Upgrade your home with permanent lighting you can enjoy all year long. Custom systems perfect for everyday curb appeal, holidays, game days, and special occasions — all controlled right from your phone.

workShowcase.description: Professional Christmas lighting installations that transform ordinary homes into magical holiday destinations

howWeWork.subtitle: Get Professional Christmas Lighting In Just 3 Easy Steps

steps.title: Get A Quote
steps.description: We've made getting professional lighting services as simple as possible. Fill out our quote request form or call us at (614) 301-7100. We will receive your request, look at your property information, and get back to you within 24-48 hours with multiple pricing options.

steps.title: Get Scheduled
steps.description: Once you've received our lighting package options and have chosen the one that fits your needs, we can then get your project booked right away! We offer flexible installation dates and work around your schedule to ensure our service fits perfectly with your availability.

steps.title: Sit Back and Relax
steps.description: Once you're on the schedule, you can sit back and relax. Our all-inclusive lighting services mean you don't have to do a single thing. Installations take 3-8 hours depending on home size, and we handle takedown and storage after the holiday season.

cta.title: Ready to Light Up Your Holidays?
cta.description: Start with a free, no-obligation quote today. Call us at (614) 301-7100 or fill out our quick form!

faq.title: Questions & Answers
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our premium holiday lighting services. Can't find your answer?

items.question: What areas do you serve for Christmas light installation?
items.answer: We serve residential and commercial clients throughout the metro area and surrounding suburbs. Contact us with your address for specific service availability.

items.question: How much does professional installation cost?
items.answer: Pricing varies based on property size and design complexity. Residential installations typically range from $300-$1,500. We provide free, no-obligation quotes after a brief property assessment.

items.question: When should I schedule my installation?
items.answer: We recommend booking 4-6 weeks before your desired installation date. Our schedule fills quickly in November. Early bookings (before October 31) receive priority scheduling.

items.question: What type of lighting do you use?
items.answer: We use commercial-grade LED lights that are energy-efficient, durable, and weather-resistant. Our seasonal C9 LED bulbs are 3x brighter than store-bought options. We also offer Invisilights permanent lighting systems.

items.question: Do you handle maintenance and removal?
items.answer: Yes. All seasonal lighting includes ongoing maintenance throughout the holiday season and full takedown after the season ends. We even store everything at our facility — no storage required on your end.

items.question: Are your installations insured?
items.answer: Absolutely. We carry $2 million in liability insurance and all technicians are trained and certified. Your property is fully protected.

items.question: Do I buy the seasonal lights or lease them?
items.answer: All seasonal lights and décor are leased and maintained by our team. You never have to worry about repairs, storage, or climbing ladders. Permanent lighting systems are purchased and installed.

items.question: Do you install lights I already own?
items.answer: We don't install customer-owned lights because we use professional-grade Christmas lighting on every project to guarantee quality, safety, and reliability all season long.
